response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds immense value to both of us. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I believe it's important to approach this transaction thoughtfully. After careful consideration, I propose to sell the product to you at a price of $1,200,000. This figure reflects the product's true worth while allowing for a fair profit on my end. I am confident that this investment will provide substantial returns for you, aligning perfectly with your expectations. Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
